name: sparkling-aria
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has a burn and takes damage from this move, its burn is healed.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles.
Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed
by the touch of these bubbles.
